title: Roku just unveiled an entertainment-focused rival to Siri and Alexa | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Roku-Express-1]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Given Roku has pretty much gone as far as it currently can with its streamingdevices buy supporting 4K and HDR, it makes sense for the company to try andmake inroads into the smart home audio world, particularly as many of theservices currently on offer tend to be proprietary systems that don’t playnice with gadgets and devices from other manufacturers.According to Roku more will be revealed at CES so keep tuned in to _TrustedReviews_ for more.**Related:[Best streaming services for2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-streaming-sites)****Does the idea of interconnected entertainment devices appeal to you, or doesit risk complicating finely-tuned setups? Let us know on our Facebook page ortweet @TrustedReviews.**
